text: Recovery of CyberArk Digital Vault Purpose —< Regain access in case of Master Policy loss Encrypts data Public Key —< Corresponding private key needed for decryption How They Work Decrypts data encrypted with public key Private Key —< Must remain private and secure CyberArk Recovery Keys Initial setup generates key pair \ Public key remains on server Usage in CyberArk Private key stored securely offline Used for recovery in case of failures Last-resort mechanism Importance —{ Essential for disaster recovery Ensures business continuity
